include.spryker/data-import: DataImport module is needed to create DataImport specific classes.
include.spryker/glue-application-extension: GlueApplicationExtension is needed to create Glue API specific classes.
include.spryker/router: Router module is needed to create Router specific classes.

include-dev.codeception/codeception: We need a specific version of it.
include-dev.phpunit/phpunit: We need a specific version of it.

exclude.spryker/symfony: All dependencies are added on their own.
exclude.spryker/twig: Twig is added on its own.
